thread.title: Ayatollah Cautiously Backs Iran’s Nuclear Deal
thread.title_full: Ayatollah Cautiously Backs Iran’s Nuclear Deal - WSJ

author: Asa Fitch
title: Ayatollah Cautiously Backs Iran’s Nuclear Deal
text:
Iran’s Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei endorsed the nuclear deal between his country and six world powers​on​Wednesday, ​all but cementing its passage, but warned that the agreement contained weaknesses of which Iran must be wary.
The deal “bears ambiguities, structural weaknesses and several issues that can lead to major losses for the present and future of the country without precise and minute-by-minute watch,” Mr. Khamenei... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
